snippet: Some say that breaking bad news on Facebook helps both sufferers and their friends, while others find it an inappropriate way to reveal events like divorces.
abstract: Many people are choosing to break bad personal news, like divorce or death, on Facebook as way to deflect difficult one-on-one conversations; while some say that posting unfortunate life events on Facebook helps both sufferers and their friends, others find it inappropriate.
lead_paragraph: Some say that breaking bad news on Facebook helps both sufferers and their friends, while others find it an inappropriate way to reveal events like divorces.

headline.seo: Using Facebook to Announce Bad News
headline.main: On Facebook, Bad With the Good
